mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRM_COMPANY (COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_TEL, COMPANY_FAX, COMPANY_ADDR, IS_USED) VALUES (#{COMPANY_NAME}, #{COMPANY_TEL}, #{COMPANY_FAX}, #{COMPANY_ADDR}, 'Y')

INSERT INTO CRM_PERSON (CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_AGE, CUSTOMER_JOB, CUSTOMER_GUBUN, REF_CUSTOMER_NO, IS_USED, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{CUSTOMER_NO}, #{CUSTOMER_NAME}, #{CUSTOMER_AGE}, #{CUSTOMER_JOB}, #{CUSTOMER_GUBUN}, #{REF_CUSTOMER_NO}, 'Y', NOW())

INSERT INTO CRM_PERSON_ADDITION (CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_PHONE, CUSTOMER_EMAIL, CUSTOMER_HOME_TEL, CUSTOMER_HOME_ADDR, COMPANY_NO, CUSTOMER_DEPT, CUSTOMER_TEAM, CUSTOMER_POSITION, CUSTOMER_COMPANY_TEL, ISNET_IMPRESSION, LAST_VISITED_DATE, FIRST_COMPANY_NAME, SECOND_COMPANY_NAME, THIRD_COMPANY_NAME, CUSTOMER_BLOOD, CUSTOMER_HEIGHT, CUSTOMER_WEIGHT, CUSTOMER_CAR, CUSTOMER_HOMETOWN, MARRIED_YN, HOBBY, HOBBY_GRADE, GRADUATE_SCHOOL_NAME, UNIVERSITY_NAME, MAJOR_NAME, HIGH_SCHOOL_NAME, MIDDLE_SCHOOL_NAME, PRIMARY_SCHOOL_NAME, CUSTOMER_ETC) VALUES (#{CUSTOMER_NO}, #{CUSTOMER_PHONE}, #{CUSTOMER_EMAIL}, #{CUSTOMER_HOME_TEL}, #{CUSTOMER_HOME_ADDR}, #{COMPANY_NO}, #{CUSTOMER_DEPT}, #{CUSTOMER_TEAM}, #{CUSTOMER_POSITION}, #{CUSTOMER_COMPANY_TEL}, #{ISNET_IMPRESSION}, #{LAST_VISITED_DATE}, #{FIRST_COMPANY_NAME}, #{SECOND_COMPANY_NAME}, #{THIRD_COMPANY_NAME}, #{CUSTOMER_BLOOD}, #{CUSTOMER_HEIGHT}, #{CUSTOMER_WEIGHT}, #{CUSTOMER_CAR}, #{CUSTOMER_HOMETOWN}, #{MARRIED_YN}, #{HOBBY}, #{HOBBY_GRADE}, #{GRADUATE_SCHOOL_NAME}, #{UNIVERSITY_NAME}, #{MAJOR_NAME}, #{HIGH_SCHOOL_NAME}, #{MIDDLE_SCHOOL_NAME}, #{PRIMARY_SCHOOL_NAME}, #{CUSTOMER_ETC})

INSERT INTO CRM_CALENDAR(CUSTOMER_NO, MEMORIAL_DATE, MEMORIAL_DATE_GUBUN, IS_LUNAR_DATE, IS_LEAP_MONTH) VALUES (#{CUSTOMER_NO}, #{MEMORIAL_DATE}, #{MEMORIAL_DATE_GUBUN}, #{IS_LUNAR_DATE}, #{IS_LEAP_MONTH})

INSERT INTO CRM_VISITED_SHEET(COMPANY_NO, CUSTOMER_NO, VISITED_DATE, VISITED_GUBUN, VISITED_MEMO, IS_USED, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{COMPANY_NO}, #{CUSTOMER_NO}, #{VISITED_DATE}, #{VISITED_GUBUN}, #{VISITED_MEMO}, #{IS_USED}, #{CREATE_DATE})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_NO, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_TEL, COMPANY_FAX, COMPANY_ADDR FROM CRM_COMPANY WHERE IS_USED = 'Y' ORDER BY COMPANY_NAME ASC

SELECT A.CUSTOMER_NO, A.CUSTOMER_NAME, B.COMPANY_NO, B.CUSTOMER_EMAIL, B.CUSTOMER_PHONE FROM CRM_PERSON A, CRM_PERSON_ADDITION B WHERE A.IS_USED = 'Y' AND A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO
AND B.COMPANY_NO = #{COMPANY_NO}
SELECT B.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM CRM_VISITED_EMPLOYEE A, TB_EMPLOYEE B WHERE A.SHEET_NO = #{SHEET_NO} AND A.EMPLOYEE_NO = B.EMPLOYEE_NO ORDER BY B.EMPLOYEE_NAME
SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_AGE, CUSTOMER_JOB, CUSTOMER_GUBUN, REF_CUSTOMER_NO FROM CRM_PERSON WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = #{CUSTOMER_NO}

SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_PHONE, CUSTOMER_EMAIL, CUSTOMER_HOME_TEL, CUSTOMER_HOME_ADDR, COMPANY_NO, CUSTOMER_DEPT, CUSTOMER_TEAM, CUSTOMER_POSITION, CUSTOMER_COMPANY_TEL, ISNET_IMPRESSION, LAST_VISITED_DATE, FIRST_COMPANY_NAME, SECOND_COMPANY_NAME, THIRD_COMPANY_NAME, CUSTOMER_BLOOD, CUSTOMER_HEIGHT, CUSTOMER_WEIGHT, CUSTOMER_CAR, CUSTOMER_HOMETOWN, MARRIED_YN, HOBBY, HOBBY_GRADE, GRADUATE_SCHOOL_NAME, UNIVERSITY_NAME, MAJOR_NAME, HIGH_SCHOOL_NAME, MIDDLE_SCHOOL_NAME, PRIMARY_SCHOOL_NAME, CUSTOMER_ETC FROM CRM_PERSON_ADDITION WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = #{CUSTOMER_NO}
SELECT MEMORIAL_DATE, MEMORIAL_DATE_GUBUN, IS_LUNAR_DATE, IS_LEAP_MONTH FROM CRM_CALENDAR WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = #{CUSTOMER_NO}
SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_AGE, CUSTOMER_JOB, CUSTOMER_GUBUN, REF_CUSTOMER_NO FROM CRM_PERSON WHERE REF_CUSTOMER_NO = #{REF_CUSTOMER_NO} AND IS_USED = 'Y'

SELECT A.CUSTOMER_NO, B.CUSTOMER_NAME, C.CUSTOMER_POSITION, A.MEMORIAL_DATE, A.MEMORIAL_DATE_GUBUN, A.IS_LUNAR_DATE, A.IS_LEAP_MONTH FROM CRM_CALENDAR A, CRM_PERSON B, CRM_PERSON_ADDITION C WHERE A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO AND A.CUSTOMER_NO = C.CUSTOMER_NO AND A.MEMORIAL_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{MONTH}, '%') AND IS_LUNAR_DATE = #{IS_LUNAR_DATE}

SELECT A.CUSTOMER_NO, B.CUSTOMER_NAME, C.CUSTOMER_POSITION, A.MEMORIAL_DATE, A.MEMORIAL_DATE_GUBUN, A.IS_LUNAR_DATE, A.IS_LEAP_MONTH FROM CRM_CALENDAR A, CRM_PERSON B, CRM_PERSON_ADDITION C WHERE A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO AND A.CUSTOMER_NO = C.CUSTOMER_NO AND ( A.MEMORIAL_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{FIRST_MONTH}, '%') OR A.MEMORIAL_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{SECOND_MONTH}, '%') OR A.MEMORIAL_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{THIRED_MONTH}, '%')) AND IS_LUNAR_DATE = #{IS_LUNAR_DATE}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CRM_VISITED_SHEET
COMPANY_NO = #{COMPANY_NO},
CUSTOMER_NO = #{CUSTOMER_NO},
VISITED_DATE = #{VISITED_DATE},
VISITED_GUBUN = #{VISITED_GUBUN},
VISITED_MEMO = #{VISITED_MEMO},
IS_USED = #{IS_USED},
WHERE SHEET_NO = #{SHEET_NO}

UPDATE CRM_PERSON
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{CUSTOMER_NAME},
CUSTOMER_AGE = #{CUSTOMER_AGE},
CUSTOMER_JOB = #{CUSTOMER_JOB},
CUSTOMER_GUBUN = #{CUSTOMER_GUBUN},
REF_CUSTOMER_NO = #{REF_CUSTOMER_NO},
IS_USED = #{IS_USED},
WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = #{CUSTOMER_NO}

UPDATE CRM_PERSON_ADDITION
CUSTOMER_PHONE = #{CUSTOMER_PHONE},
CUSTOMER_EMAIL = #{CUSTOMER_EMAIL},
CUSTOMER_HOME_TEL = #{CUSTOMER_HOME_TEL},
CUSTOMER_HOME_ADDR = #{CUSTOMER_HOME_ADDR},
COMPANY_NO = #{COMPANY_NO},
CUSTOMER_DEPT = #{CUSTOMER_DEPT},
CUSTOMER_TEAM = #{CUSTOMER_TEAM},
CUSTOMER_POSITION = #{CUSTOMER_POSITION},
CUSTOMER_COMPANY_TEL = #{CUSTOMER_COMPANY_TEL},
ISNET_IMPRESSION = #{ISNET_IMPRESSION},
LAST_VISITED_DATE = #{LAST_VISITED_DATE},
FIRST_COMPANY_NAME = #{FIRST_COMPANY_NAME},
SECOND_COMPANY_NAME = #{SECOND_COMPANY_NAME},
THIRD_COMPANY_NAME = #{THIRD_COMPANY_NAME},
CUSTOMER_BLOOD = #{CUSTOMER_BLOOD},
CUSTOMER_HEIGHT = #{CUSTOMER_HEIGHT},
CUSTOMER_WEIGHT = #{CUSTOMER_WEIGHT},
CUSTOMER_CAR = #{CUSTOMER_CAR},
CUSTOMER_HOMETOWN = #{CUSTOMER_HOMETOWN},
MARRIED_YN = #{MARRIED_YN},
HOBBY = #{HOBBY},
HOBBY_GRADE = #{HOBBY_GRADE},
GRADUATE_SCHOOL_NAME = #{GRADUATE_SCHOOL_NAME},
UNIVERSITY_NAME = #{UNIVERSITY_NAME},
HIGH_SCHOOL_NAME = #{HIGH_SCHOOL_NAME},
MIDDLE_SCHOOL_NAME = #{MIDDLE_SCHOOL_NAME},
PRIMARY_SCHOOL_NAME = #{PRIMARY_SCHOOL_NAME},
MAJOR_NAME = #{MAJOR_NAME},
CUSTOMER_ETC = #{CUSTOMER_ETC},
WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = #{CUSTOMER_NO}

UPDATE CRM_COMPANY
COMPANY_NAME = #{COMPANY_NAME},
COMPANY_TEL = #{COMPANY_TEL},
COMPANY_FAX = #{COMPANY_FAX},
COMPANY_ADDR = #{COMPANY_ADDR},
IS_USED = #{IS_USED},
WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{COMPANY_NO}
